the creation of your perfect gold jewel.

Founded In 1986, Luna Owned & Operated Business Has Become A House-Hold Name In States All Over The USA As Well As Countries All Over The World.

For those that rather the full immersion of the in store experience we welcome your company and look forward to meeting you face to face. Being located in the 47 street diamond district, known to be the largest diamond.

Based in the heart of New York’s Diamond District, also known as the NYC diamond district, Luna has some of the most competitively priced in the market. It is our goal to supply our clients.
Explore what others have created and find inspiration for your own

Tiffany round diamonds catch the light and make it dance. Bracelet in 18k rose gold with a round brilliant diamond. 7″ long.

  

$2,100

Featuring v-shaped details, the nesting band ring is the perfect complement to all Tiffany engagement ring styles.

  

$1,900

Fine jewelry deserves fair prices. And so do you. All of our jewelry is born, raised, and handmade in NYC.

  

$2,100

Diamonds dazzle against the leaves in a design inspired by the olive branch, a symbol of peace and abundance.

  

$1,400

Inspired by the olive branch, a symbol of peace and abundance. In 18k gold with a round brilliant diamond.

  

$2,100

Whether in deep or deck, diamonds level up any look, studs work in any situations. Graphic links and gold rings hold their own an look even better together.

Too muchis never enough. It’s called a good statement for a reason.
Book a meeting to share your engagement ring ideas, timeline and budget. Financing available.

content_1.text: See sketched designs and estimates and give us feedback. We’ll revise until we’ve nailed the design and source additional stones if needed.

content_1_1.text: Your ring is architected and precisely engineered with CAD, cast in metal, and the stones are set by hand.

quote.text: Luna’s Jewellery never ceases to amaze me - I love her originality and thoughtfulness. Her website is often my first port of call if I want something special for myself or a friend.

title.text:
Luna’s Philosophy that  Beauty and
Strength Exist in Both Union and
Individuality
